entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
